member.name: T:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskPriority
member.summary: Represents the priority levels that can be assigned to a task.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskPriority.Low
member.summary: Low priority task (can be deferred if necessary).

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskPriority.Medium
member.summary: Normal priority task (default).

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskPriority.High
member.summary: High priority task (should be addressed soon).

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskPriority.Urgent
member.summary: Critical priority task (requires immediate attention).

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskPriority.Blocked
member.summary: The task is blocked by another task or dependency.

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus
member.summary: Represents the possible statuses of a task.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus.Pending
member.summary: The task has been created but not yet started.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus.InProgress
member.summary: The task is currently being worked on.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus.Completed
member.summary: The task has been completed.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus.Overdue
member.summary: The task is past its due date and not completed.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The task has been canceled and will not be completed.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus.OnHold
member.summary: The task is on hold and not currently being worked on.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Enums.TaskStatus.PendingApproval
member.summary: The task is waiting for approval before proceeding.

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Interfaces.IAgentAction
member.summary: Interface that all agent actions must implement for standardized validation

member.summary: Standardized interface for validating agent actions across all agents Ensures consistent action relevance validation, approval workflows, and explainability

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog
member.summary: Audit log for tracking access to protected resources. Provides comprehensive forensic trail for privacy compliance.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.RequestingUserId
member.summary: The user who requested access to the resource.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.OrganizationId
member.summary: The organization the requesting agent belongs to.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.ResourceType
member.summary: Type of resource being accessed (Contact, Interaction, etc.).

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.ResourceId
member.summary: Unique identifier of the resource being accessed.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.ContactId
member.summary: Contact ID if the resource is related to a specific contact.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.AccessGranted
member.summary: Whether access was granted or denied.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.Reason
member.summary: Reason for the access decision (e.g., "Owner", "Collaborator", "Denied - No Permission").

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.PrivacyTags
member.summary: Privacy tags associated with the accessed resource. JSON array of tags like ["PERSONAL", "PRIVATE", "CRM"].

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.IpAddress
member.summary: IP address of the requesting client.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.UserAgent
member.summary: User agent string of the requesting client.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.Metadata
member.summary: Additional metadata about the access request. JSON object with request details.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.AccessedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the access was attempted.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.RequestingUser
member.summary: Navigation property to the requesting user.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.Organization
member.summary: Navigation property to the organization.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.AccessAuditLog.Contact
member.summary: Navigation property to the contact (if applicable).

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.RelationshipState
member.summary: Represents the relationship state of a contact in the GoG system. Contacts can transition between states as relationships evolve.

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.ContactStateHistory
member.summary: Tracks state transition history for analytics and audit purposes.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.OrganizationId
member.summary: Organization that owns this contact (for multi-tenant support).

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.RelationshipState
member.summary: Current relationship state - can evolve over time as relationships change.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.IsActiveClient
member.summary: Boolean flag for compliance and legal triggers when someone becomes an active client. Set to true when client signs representation agreement or enters active transaction.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.ClientSince
member.summary: Timestamp when contact first became a client (for analytics and compliance).

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.CompanyName
member.summary: Company name for service providers (e.g., "ABC Lending", "XYZ Inspections").

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.LicenseNumber
member.summary: Professional license number for licensed service providers.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Specialties
member.summary: Service specialties (e.g., "FHA Loans", "Commercial Properties", "New Construction").

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.ServiceAreas
member.summary: Geographic service areas (e.g., "Downtown", "North County", "San Diego County").

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Rating
member.summary: Professional rating (1-5 stars) based on client feedback.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.ReviewCount
member.summary: Number of reviews/ratings received.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.IsPreferred
member.summary: Indicates if this is a preferred service provider.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Website
member.summary: Website URL for service providers.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.OwnerId
member.summary: For agent contacts - links to their User record if they're part of the organization.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Tags
member.summary: Segmentation tags only (e.g., VIP, Buyer, Region). DO NOT use for privacy/business logic (CRM, PERSONAL, PRIVATE, etc.). All privacy/business logic must be enforced via Interaction.Tags.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Owner
member.summary: The user who owns/manages this contact (for agent contacts, this is the human agent managing the AI)

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Organization
member.summary: The organization this contact belongs to

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.AssignedTo
member.summary: The user currently assigned to manage this contact

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Interactions
member.summary: All interactions with this contact

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.AssignedResources
member.summary: Resources (service providers) assigned to this contact

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.ResourceAssignments
member.summary: Assignments where this contact is the resource (service provider)

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.StateHistory
member.summary: History of state transitions for this contact

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.Collaborators
member.summary: Users who have been granted access to collaborate on this contact

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.CollaboratingOn
member.summary: Contacts that this user is collaborating on

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.TransitionToState(Emma.Models.Models.RelationshipState,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Helper method to transition contact to a new relationship state. Automatically tracks history and updates relevant flags.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.IsServiceProvider
member.summary: Checks if this contact is a service provider (ServiceProvider or Agent).

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.IsBusinessLead
member.summary: Checks if the contact is a potential business lead (Lead or Prospect).

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.IsClient
member.summary: Checks if the contact is currently in any client state (active or past).

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.CanBeAssignedAsResource
member.summary: Checks if this contact can be assigned as a resource to clients.

member.summary: Assigns this contact as a service provider to a client contact.
member.param: The contact that will receive this service provider
member.exception: Thrown if the contact cannot be assigned as a resource

member.summary: Grants collaboration access to another user for this contact.
member.param: The role to assign to the collaborator
member.exception: Thrown if the contact is not in a valid state for collaboration
Thrown if required parameters are null

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.Contact.UpdateRating(System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Updates service provider rating based on client feedback.
Updates the rating for this contact if it's a service provider.
member.exception: Thrown if the contact is not a service provider
Thrown if the rating is not between 1 and 5

member.summary: Checks if a user has permission to view this contact.
member.param: The user to check permissions for
member.returns: True if the user has permission to view this contact

member.summary: Checks if a user has permission to edit this contact.
member.param: The user to check permissions for
member.returns: True if the user has permission to edit this contact

member.summary: Transfers ownership of this contact to another user.
member.exception: Thrown if the transfer is not allowed

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.EmailAddress.Address
member.summary: The email address - must be unique across all contacts in the system

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.EmailAddress.ContactId
member.summary: Foreign key to the Contact that owns this email address

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.EmailAddress.Contact
member.summary: Navigation property to the Contact

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment
member.summary: Represents the assignment of a service provider contact to a client contact. This model enables tracking of service provider assignments while maintaining proper User/Agent separation and audit trails.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this assignment.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ContactId
member.summary: The contact receiving the service (the client). This is a required field and represents the contact being served.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ClientContact
member.summary: Navigation property to the client contact receiving the service.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ServiceContactId
member.summary: The service provider contact being assigned. This is a required field and represents the contact providing the service.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ServiceContact
member.summary: Navigation property to the service provider contact.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.AssignedByUserId
member.summary: The user who made this assignment. This is a required field and represents the human user who created the assignment.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.AssignedByUser
member.summary: Navigation property to the user who made the assignment.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.OrganizationId
member.summary: The organization that owns this assignment. This is a required field and ensures proper multi-tenant isolation.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.Organization
member.summary: Navigation property to the organization that owns this assignment.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.Purpose
member.summary: Purpose of the assignment (e.g., "Home inspection", "Loan pre-approval"). This is a required field that describes why this assignment was created.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.Status
member.summary: The current status of this assignment. Defaults to Active when a new assignment is created.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.Priority
member.summary: The priority level of this assignment. Helps in sorting and prioritizing work.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.InteractionId
member.summary: Optional reference to the interaction that triggered this assignment. Useful for tracking the source of the assignment.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.Interaction
member.summary: Navigation property to the interaction that triggered this assignment.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ClientRequest
member.summary: Client's specific request or requirements for this assignment. Limited to 1000 characters to keep the database efficient.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.AssignedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the assignment was made. Automatically set to the current UTC time when the assignment is created.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.CompletedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the assignment was marked as completed. Null until the assignment is completed.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.FollowUpAt
member.summary: Date and time for a follow-up on this assignment. Optional and can be set based on business rules or user input.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.WasUsed
member.summary: Indicates whether the client actually used the service provider. This is typically updated after the service is delivered.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ClientRating
member.summary: Client's rating of the service provider on a scale of 1-5 stars. Null until the client provides a rating.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ClientFeedback
member.summary: Client's feedback about the service provider. Limited to 1000 characters to maintain database efficiency.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.OutcomeNotes
member.summary: Notes about the outcome of the assignment. Used for internal tracking and reporting.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.InternalNotes
member.summary: Internal notes for the agent/team. Not visible to the client or service provider.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ReferralDisclosureProvided
member.summary: Whether referral disclosure has been provided to the client. Required for compliance in many jurisdictions.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.ReferralDisclosureDate
member.summary: Date when referral disclosure was provided to the client. Automatically set when ReferralDisclosureProvided is set to true.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.LiabilityDisclaimerAcknowledged
member.summary: Whether liability disclaimer has been acknowledged by the client. Important for legal protection.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.LiabilityDisclaimerDate
member.summary: Date when liability disclaimer was acknowledged by the client. Automatically set when LiabilityDisclaimerAcknowledged is set to true.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.CreatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when this record was created. Automatically set to the current UTC time when the record is created.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when this record was last updated. Automatically updated whenever the record is modified.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.CustomFields
member.summary: Custom fields for storing additional data. Useful for extensibility without schema changes.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.MarkAsCompleted(System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Decimal},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Marks the assignment as completed with optional notes and rating.
member.param: Whether the client used the service provider

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.RecordDisclosureProvided
member.summary: Records that referral disclosure was provided to the client.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.RecordLiabilityAcknowledgment
member.summary: Records that the liability disclaimer was acknowledged by the client.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.Validate
member.summary: Validates that the assignment is properly configured.
member.returns: A tuple indicating validity and any error message.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactAssignment.CreateFollowUpAssignment(Emma.Models.Models.User,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new assignment based on this one, useful for recurring services.
member.param: The user creating the new assignment
Optional new purpose, uses current purpose if not specified
member.returns: A new ContactAssignment with similar settings

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.CollaboratorRole
member.summary: Defines the level of access and permissions for a user collaborating on a contact. This enables team-based contact management while maintaining appropriate access controls.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Models.CollaboratorRole.BackupUser
member.summary: Can handle all business interactions in primary user's absence. Has full access to business-related data but respects personal data privacy.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Models.CollaboratorRole.Specialist
member.summary: Has expertise in specific areas (e.g., luxury, commercial properties). Can interact with relevant contacts and update information.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Models.CollaboratorRole.Mentor
member.summary: Senior user providing guidance to junior team members. Can view and edit interactions they're involved in.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Models.CollaboratorRole.Assistant
member.summary: Administrative support with limited access. Can perform assigned tasks but cannot access sensitive information.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Models.CollaboratorRole.TeamLead
member.summary: Team leader with oversight access. Can view all team interactions and manage team resources.

member.name: F:Emma.Models.Models.CollaboratorRole.Observer
member.summary: Read-only access for training or oversight purposes. Cannot make any changes to contact data.

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator
member.summary: Represents a collaboration relationship between a user and a contact they have access to. Defines the scope of access and permissions for the collaboration.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this collaboration record.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CreatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when this collaboration record was created.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when this collaboration record was last updated.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.ContactId
member.summary: The client contact that the collaborator has access to. This is a required field and cannot be null.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.Contact
member.summary: Navigation property to the contact being collaborated on.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CollaboratorUserId
member.summary: The user who is collaborating on this contact. This must be a valid user ID within the organization.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CollaboratorUser
member.summary: Navigation property to the user who is collaborating.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.GrantedByUserId
member.summary: The user who granted this collaboration access. This is typically an admin or the contact owner.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.GrantedByUser
member.summary: Navigation property to the user who granted access.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.OrganizationId
member.summary: The organization that this collaboration belongs to. This ensures proper multi-tenant isolation.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.Organization
member.summary: Navigation property to the organization.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.Role
member.summary: Role defining the type and scope of collaboration. This determines the default permissions for the collaborator.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanAccessBusinessInteractions
member.summary: Can access business interactions (CRM tagged interactions).

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanAccessPersonalInteractions
member.summary: Can access personal interactions (PERSONAL tagged interactions). Usually false to respect privacy.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanCreateInteractions
member.summary: Can create new interactions on behalf of the primary agent.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanEditInteractions
member.summary: Can modify existing interactions.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanAssignResources
member.summary: Can assign resources to this contact.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanAccessFinancialData
member.summary: Can view contact's financial/transaction details.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanEditContactDetails
member.summary: Can edit contact details and properties.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanManageCollaborators
member.summary: Can manage other collaborators for this contact.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanViewAuditLogs
member.summary: Can view audit logs for this contact.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.Reason
member.summary: Optional reason for granting collaboration access.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.ExpiresAt
member.summary: When collaboration access expires (optional).

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.IsActive
member.summary: Whether this collaboration is currently active.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.IsValid
member.summary: Determines if this collaboration is currently active and not expired.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.Validate
member.summary: Validates that this collaboration record is properly configured.
member.returns: A tuple indicating validity and any error message.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CanAccessInteraction(Emma.Models.Models.Interaction)
member.summary: Checks if the collaborator can access a specific interaction based on their permissions.
member.param: The interaction to check access for
member.returns: True if access is allowed, false otherwise

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.HasPermission(System.Func{Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Checks if the collaborator has a specific permission.
member.returns: True if the permission is granted

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.UpdatePermissionsFromRole
member.summary: Updates the permissions based on the current role. This can be overridden by setting individual permission flags.

member.name: M:Emma.Models.Models.ContactCollaborator.CloneForUser(Emma.Models.Models.User,Emma.Models.Models.User)
member.summary: Creates a copy of this collaboration with the same permissions but for a different user.

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.Resource
member.summary: OBSOLETE: This entity is being phased out in favor of Contact-centric approach. Service providers are now represented as Contact entities with RelationshipState.ServiceProvider. Use ContactAssignment instead of ResourceAssignment for service provider assignments.

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.ResourceAssignment
member.summary: OBSOLETE: This entity is being phased out in favor of Contact-centric approach. Use ContactAssignment instead, which links ClientContact to ServiceContact (both are Contact entities).

member.name: T:Emma.Models.Models.ResourceRecommendation
member.summary: Represents a recommendation of a service provider (Contact) to a client (Contact). This replaces the older Resource/ResourceAssignment model with a Contact-centric approach.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ResourceRecommendation.ContactId
member.summary: The client contact receiving the recommendation.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ResourceRecommendation.ServiceContactId
member.summary: The service provider contact being recommended.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ResourceRecommendation.RecommendedByUserId
member.summary: The user who made the recommendation.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ResourceRecommendation.InteractionId
member.summary: The interaction that triggered this recommendation, if any.

member.name: P:Emma.Models.Models.ResourceRecommendation.RecommendationOrder
member.summary: The order of this recommendation in the list (1st, 2nd, 3rd choice).
